$TSLA The car moves almost as fast as the stock price. 

https://electrek.co/2017/03/20/tesla-model-s-p100d-quarter-mile-record-broken/

links.title: Tesla Model S P100D quarter-mile record broken again on the same day: 10.638 seconds
links.description: Just earlier today, we reported on a Tesla Model S P100D setting a new real-world quarter-mile record: 10.723 seconds. It has already been broken and by a significant margin. Chris Bergemann from Oregon set the new 10.638-second record around the same time that DragTimes was running 10.723-scond runs on the other side of the country, but the 10.7-second only held for less than a day.
